short_summary: The requirements for two 6.5 to 6.8m Fibreglass Boats with center console and trailer and further, filed under Global Goods \\ 25111500 \\ Commercial marine craft
description: Fisheries and Oceans Canada has a requirement for the fabrication and supply of two, 6.5 to 6.8m  Fibreglass Boats with center console and trailer, built in accordance with Annex A - Technical Statement of Requirement (TSOR) and Annex F \\  Bidder questions and Canada Responses.
duration_in_months: If the contract is exercised for the full period of 12 months, the CBCO has agreed to purchase up to two (2) additional 6.5 to 6.8m fibreglass boats with centre console and trailer, subject to availability and performance. It is understood that the CBCO may not have the wherewithal to exercise this option, should additional funding mandated be  unavailable prior to the contract award decision. additional funding forthis option will be recomended at a later date.
